title: Lal Isua hmangaihna
lyrics:
Lal Isua hmangaihna ropui hi,
Hringfa ten kan hrefiah zo lo fo thin;
Hmangaihna thuril danglam leh mawi chu,
Lal Isua hmangaihna hi a ni.

Nunchau in i rum thin maw? Beidawng in i tap thin maw?
Lal Isua hmangaihna chuan a nghak che;
Sawmtute a hnar ngai lo, tlai luat pawh a awm nem maw,
Lal Isua hmangaihna hi a mak a ni.

Lal Isua hi aw a mawi ber e,
Hlinglukhum in phuar vel mahsela;
Ka lal ka chhandamtu chu ka fak ang chatuan thleng in,
Haleluiah! tiin ka fak ang.

Bawrhsawmna ka tawh chang leh chak lova ka awmlai pawn,
Lal Isua hmangaihna chu a tawk e;
Mal in min awmtir ngailo zanthim pawh,
Amah nen chuan muang takin ka kal amah ka thian a ni.

Eng dang reng ka ngai tawh lo'ng,
I hmangaihna kut chauh hi aw Isu ka tan a tawk khawvelah,
Van hmunmawi ka thlen thleng in hei hi ka chatuan hla tur,
Lal Isua hmangaihna hi a hlu ber e.
